/Users/Dave.Turner/vip/src/monortm_v4.2/spectral_lines.dat
0       Verbose level (0 is quiet, 1 is DEBUG)
6       Default atmos (1->trop, 2->MLS, 3->MLW, 4->SAS, 5->SAW, 6->USStd)
1       Ispd (0->use all lines and go slow, 1->use subset and go faster)
1.000       Self-broadened WV continuum multiplier
1.000       Foreign-broadened WV continuum multiplier
1.000       CO2 continuum multiplier
1.000       O3 continuum multiplier
1.000       O2 continuum multiplier
1.000       N2 continuum multiplier
15.0        Minimum altitude [km MSL] that sonde must achieve to be used, Number of model levels (next line), Heights in km above minimum input sonde level (all lines following), and a blank line at the end
